name: nativescript-lottie
description: NativeScript plugin to expose AirBnB Lottie library

scripts.build: npm i && tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm run preparedemong && cd demo-ng && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm run preparedemong && cd demo-ng && tns run android
scripts.debug.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns debug ios --emulator
scripts.debug.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns debug android --emulator
scripts.preparedemong: npm run build && cd demo-ng && tns plugin remove nativescript-lottie && tns plugin add ../ && tns install
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-lottie && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo && npm install && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
